participant_1.name: Alexander
participant_1.personality: Confident and ambitious, enjoys luxury and has high aspirations.
participant_1.background: i drive a bmw. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i grew up in manhattan.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and determined, she is focused on her studies and has a cheerful demeanor.
participant_2.background: i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i don't like chicken. i've blonde hair and blue eyes. i'm in college to become a nurse.
